testcase.classname: Search Add Hammer to Shopping Cart
testcase.name: Search and Add 1 Hammer item to shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to bunnings website "https://bunnings.com.au"..........passed Then search for the item "Hammer" and click Search button...................passed Then Add the first item from the search to the Cart.........................passed And Click Review and Checkout in the search results page....................passed Then Verify whether the same product is added in the Review Cart page.......passed

testcase.classname: Search Add Hammer to Shopping Cart
testcase.name: Search and Add 2 Hammer items to shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to bunnings website "https://bunnings.com.au"..........passed Then search for the item "Hammer" and click Search button...................passed Then Add 2 quantities of the first item from the search to the Cart.........passed And Click Review and Checkout in the search results page....................passed Then Verify whether the same product is added in the Review Cart page.......passed Then Verify whether the selected quantity is the same.......................passed

testcase.classname: Search Add Hammer to Shopping Cart
testcase.name: Search and Add 2 Hammer items and reduce 1 quantity in Review Cart page
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to bunnings website "https://bunnings.com.au"..........passed Then search for the item "Hammer" and click Search button...................passed Then Add 2 quantities of the first item from the search to the Cart.........passed And Click Review and Checkout in the search results page....................passed Then Verify whether the same product is added in the Review Cart page.......passed Then Verify we can able to reduce the count by 1 in the Review Cart page....passed
